font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 狂饮： to drink especially liquor greedily, continually, or habitually
【例】 guzzle beer 狂饮啤酒
【近】 gulp, quaff, swig, booze, soak, tipple

【记】 guttle；音：嘎嚼，嘎嘎嘎地大嚼
